title: Lectures on W-Gravity, W-Geometry and \W-Strings
abstract: Lectures given at the Trieste Summer School, 1992. These notes are an update of my review article "Classical and Quantum W-Gravity", preprint QMW-92-1, published in in "Strings and Symmetries 1991", with some extra material on W-geometry, W-symmetry in conformal field theory and W-strings.
